sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO fileboard( unq, title, pass, name, content, rdate, udate, filename, filesize ) VALUES( fileBoard_seq.nextval, #title#, #pass#, #name#, #content#, sysdate, sysdate, #filename#, #filesize#
)
sqlMap.select: SELECT b.* from( SELECT rownum rn, a.* from ( Select unq,title,name,to_char(rdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') rdate,filename,hits from fileboard order by unq desc ) a ) b where rn BETWEEN $sNo$ AND $eNo$
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM fileboard WHERE unq=#unq# AND pass=#pass#
SELECT unq, title, name, content, to_char(rdate,'yyyy/mm/dd') rdate, to_char(udate,'yyyy/mm/dd') udate, filename, filesize FROM fileboard WHERE unq=#unq#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE fileboard SET filename=#newfilename# WHERE unq=#unq#

UPDATE fileboard SET title='$title$', name='$name$', content='$content$', udate=sysdate $filename$
WHERE unq = '$unq$'
